titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Fairhaven City Water and Power Company ledger book 1915-1923
Fairhaven City Water and Power Company ledger book

origination.corpname: Fairhaven City Water and Power Company

did.unittitle: Fairhaven City Water and Power Company ledger book
did.abstract: Incorporated in 1890, the Fairhaven City Water and Power Company supplied water and power to Fairhaven, using Lake Padden as its source. In municipal elections held in December 1925, the city voted to buy out the company. This collection comprises one financial ledger from the company dated 1915-1923.

bioghist.p: Incorporated in 1890, the Fairhaven City Water and Power Company supplied water and power to Fairhaven, Washington, using Lake Padden as its source. In municipal elections held in December 1925, the city voted to buy out the company.

scopecontent.p: The collection comprises one financial ledger from the Fairhaven City Water and Power Company.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: Fairhaven City Water and Power Company ledger book, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

acqinfo.p: Donated by Gordon Tweit in December 2003.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
